description:
Rinne tries to purify a poltergeist, and Sakura helps a spirit who`s scared of eggplants. Later, the group takes a trip to a festival to bust a Damashigami scheme.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bessou no Akuryou / Nasu Roman / One Coin Chousa
Evil Spirit in the Summer House / Eggplant Romance / One Coin Investigation
Le spectre de la villa – Romance d`aubergine – Une pièce pour une enquête
別荘の悪霊 / ナスロマン / ワンコイン調査
